org.wildfly.swarm.spi.api.annotations

Annotation Type DeploymentModule


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={METHOD,FIELD,PARAMETER,TYPE})
 @Repeatable(value=DeploymentModules.class)
public @interface DeploymentModule
    Provides for simple runtime configuration of a Fraction.
    Author:
    Bob McWhirter

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean export
